titles.title: Airline Pension Fairness Act of 2012
Airline Pension Fairness Act of 2012
To amend the Pension Protection Act of 2006 to extend special funding rules for certain plans maintained by commercial airlines, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Airline Pension Fairness Act of 2012 - Amends the Pension Protection Act of 2006 to extend special alternative funding rules for single-employer defined benefit retirement plans for commercial airlines for plan years 2012 and 2013.
